decisions.what: Skip failing Cypress test checkoutWithTwoWeekCadence.spec.ts on master to unblock PRs

decisions.what: Move program subscriptions to end of subscription list
decisions.context: Fix reactivation banner showing incorrectly for users with active Factor subscription but deactivated program subscription

decisions.what: Replace Statsig feature flag with new endpoint for one-step cancellation funnel
decisions.context: Part of new cancellation compliance requirements

blockers.impact: Blocked multiple PRs from merging (U03UNDBPVPY, U01V9SX5NG5)

blockers.description: E2E test checkoutWithFreeAddonsPopup.spec.ts failing due to staging instability
blockers.impact: Blocking PR #56713, related to process order staging issues

action_items.task: Review and approve PR #56455 (Discount Communication state management refactor)
Review and approve PR #56466 (Discount Communication tracking updates)
QA and review PR #56622 (delivery address API migration)
Review PR #56756 (delivery_dates_endpoint flags) - needs WL critical review
Create ticket to cleanup 3-year-old experiment code
Review and QA PR #57090 (Contentful translation keys for sub-brands)
Wait and rerun failing E2E tests after staging stabilizes

key_context.summary: Ongoing multi-PR effort to refactor Discount Communication components, moving redux state management out of components, updating tracking, and adding sub-brand support with Contentful translations. Work is being done incrementally with careful review.
key_context.relevance: Major architectural improvement affecting GoodChop and Factor brands

key_context.summary: Migration from old to new API endpoints for delivery address changes in plan settings, removing deliveryTime from PATCH subscription calls while maintaining it in response bodies.
key_context.relevance: Part of broader API modernization effort affecting subscription management

key_context.summary: Multiple Cypress E2E tests failing on master due to both code changes and staging environment instability, requiring test skipping and monitoring via Honeycomb.
key_context.relevance: Impacting developer velocity and PR merge capability

key_context.summary: New Factor subscription type for weight loss programs requiring special handling in subscription ordering to fix reactivation banner logic for users with multiple subscriptions.
key_context.relevance: New product feature requiring cross-squad awareness for potential side effects

key_context.summary: Replacing Statsig feature flags with new endpoint to implement one-step cancellation funnel as part of regulatory compliance requirements.

summary: GoodChop squad handled 11 support requests primarily focused on code reviews for Discount Communication refactoring, API migrations, and test failures. Key work includes redux refactoring, sub-brand support, program subscriptions ordering, and cancellation compliance updates.
